name: Stitched Together
description:
You're Brutus, Sewer of Dimensions and you need to close the dimensional breach that opened in the Wooly World. Be quick or be swallowed endlessly through space and time!

Only playable with Xbox 360 Controller
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020

Designers:

Tommaso Verde 

Lorenzo Malara

Programmers:

Alessio Sicoli

Christopher Bonetto

2D Artists:

Federica Emili

Thomas Gullotti

Sound Designer:

Thomas Gullotti

There might be some assets that belong to you Mr.Nintendo, so please be kind to us.
